keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour policies that support the many not the few. We cannot risk crashing out of Europe with no trade deals.
From quality public services and improved National Security to a Brexit deal genuinely in the interests of the UK.
To stop fox hunting because it’s cruel and harmful.

mentions.candidate: I am therefore proud to be standing for Warrington South. My home is here, I am an experienced Borough Councillor and I was privileged to serve as Mayor of Warrington in 2016-17. We need a Member of Parliament dedicated to promoting the interests of all our residents and communities.
mentions.tacticalSituation: To stop the Tories winning again here in Warrington South every Labour supporter has to vote in this vital General Election.

issues.brexitEurope: We cannot risk crashing out of Europe with no trade deals in place.

community.content: From quality public services and improved National Security to a Brexit deal genuinely in the interests of the UK.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am therefore proud to be standing for Warrington South. My home is here, I am an experienced Borough Councillor and I was privileged to serve as Mayor of Warrington in 2016-17. We need a Member of Parliament dedicated to promoting the interests of all our residents and communities.

contactInformation.address: Suite 97, 95 Dewhurst Road, Birchwood Warrington WA3 7PG

examples: I was privileged to serve as Mayor of Warrington in 2016-17.
Theresa May has badly misjudged the country's mood, our concerns and our aspirations for the future.
Her shambolic campaign re-boot hasn't worked and people are losing confidence in the Tories' un-costed policies and U-turns.
We need a Member of Parliament dedicated to promoting the interests of all our residents and communities.
